name: Thieves of Honor
description:
A strategy game features pirates' age, naval wars, and cabin-development.

Welcome to THIEVES OF HONOR!🏴‍☠️

Immerse yourself in a world of Pirates in this RTS game where you must take over the ocean by sailing and winning Pirate battles.

Set sail and discover all the secrets in the Pirate's paradise deep in the Devil's Seas.

Start your journey, make your fortune by plundering merchant ships, and search for treasure in the deep sea. Use the trophies to build your own fleet.

Upgrade your ship and train the crew as much as you can because you will soon encounter giant sea monsters and Navy warships.

【CRAFT YOUR FLAGSHIPS, SET SAIL WITH YOUR MOBILE HEADQUARTERS】 ☠️

As a pirate, you've got a ship and it's your base. You can do everything on the ocean, including preparing for battles, engaging in fights, collecting resources and enhancing your power. And when the crew grows, you add more cabins to house them and improve the ship.

Leave the docks behind and set sail on this pirate adventure. The pirate ship is now your base for exploring the seas, finding treasure and becoming the lord of the sea. Try your best to upgrade your mobile headquarters at the sea!

【CUSTOMIZE YOUR PIRATE CABINS】 🛠

Access the ship's interior to build, upgrade and retrofit cabins.

Put your crew members to work to upgrade the ship so you can have better resources to store and ready yourselves for battles.

【ENGAGE IN ROBUST SEA BATTLES】 ⚔️

Set Sail to Explore or Attack. You will encounter Sea Monsters, Navy or other notorious Pirates at the sea.

Engage in fierce battles fighting solo or with allied ships that will increase your power. Good Luck!

【PLUNDERING AND TREASURE HUNT】 💰

Plundering is the core of pirate art, while hunting for treasure chests is the ultimate romance of piracy.

Win battles and obtain precious resources from sea monsters or other players. Get the goods and gold from your enemies!

Find treasure through maps or clues in words. Maps points to where the treasure is buried and clues help you take a direction.

【PIRATE TRADE】 💵

Visit ports and trade different types of goods and local speciaties. Moor at the docks to find trading places and black markets to dispose of plunder.

Gain popularity to be able to trade in more guilds and be a recognised pirate merchant in the market.

【ANGLING】 🎣

Angle with the rising sun and sinking moon. Fish can be cooked and served as delicious dishes. Har! Don't forget to brew your favorite liquor for the feast!

Tips❗：Some kinds of ingredients can be combined with jellyfish to make grilled fish😮

Become a pirate legend! Download THIEVES OF HONOR now!
